author: lgo
msg: Correctly report errors during authn handling of a response to the application.
This should fix the problem that r2360 originally tried to solve.
The basic idea is that serf reports any error to the application via the normal
handle_response callback. When the application has read the entire body, it
will receive the error status code instead of APR_EOF.
(serf_response_read): Replace APR_EOF with error_on_eof, if set.
(serf_response_readline): Replace APR_EOF with error_on_eof, if set.
(handle_response): Report an error during authn handling to the application.
